title: Ticket #5057: Allow admins to specify a wrapper script around job startup
description:
The blahp currently auto-generates our PBS submit file.

In some cases, we'd like to be able to specify a wrapper script for the actual user job. An example is at NERSC, where we want to use the 'pbsdsh' wrapper script to launch a pilot across all cores associated with the job (possibly on several hosts).

It looks like the sysadmin can already specify a script using the environment variable BLAHP_AUX_WRAPPER, but that only is relevant if file transfers are used (not in use by HTCondor-CE).
remarks:
